name: check_wordpress
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wordpress_checker.
Tool description: RESTful API that allows you to check if a website is based on WordPress and returns the version of WordPress if it is
API description: Checks whether the specified URL is running WordPress using the provided User-Agent and RapidAPI key.

user_agent.description: The User-Agent string to include in the request headers.

url.description: The URL of the website to check for WordPress.
